resources.string: Wecome to Musical Symphony. Select your preference and enjoy one stop shop for music.

This screen will display recent searches done. List View, custom adapter will be used to store and retrieve information.
User can select from available radio stations. Recently Played items will also be displayed and different genres will be displayed. Thinking of integrating music APIs in this at later stage.
